price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߛߊߣߌ߲ߡߊ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߞߘߐߕߊ߬ ߓߘߍߞߍ߭ ߸ ߝߋ߲߫ ߡߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߝߐ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ ߡߊ߬
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yaqūlūna ʿuluwwan kabīran
